page.title: 13**Sheep keeping*************
page.content: I live on a farm and we keep sheep.They are called ewes and gimmers and hoggets.They always get them in in the winter and when they start to lamb, Dad hasto give them some nuts and water and hay. Sometimes we help to hay and water and Dad carries bags of food. He went into hospital and now he is out but we have more trouble. The owner is retiring and the new man is selling our farm. Everyday Dad goes out shepherding. He always takes the dogs out. Their names are Nell, and George and Joe. Joe does not do what Dad says. Dad puts ear tags in.Ear tags are coloured red, turquoise, orange and yellow. He puts them on with some silver ear tag cutters; they always bleed and all blood drips down from their ears. Dad always does it .He does some sheering. He sheers six hundred and fifteen sheep. Mum spins the wool
